// Flash Device Information.
// DDP1000 & DDP1010
// 03/07/2001
// 03/22/2002 Added AT49B(L)V8192A and fixed sector addresses for AT49BV4096A - crb
// 09/12/2006 Added Spansion S29GL032A - rah
//
// Mfg      MfgID           Device   DevID   Mb Alg     Size #sec  Sector_Addresses
